DOC.brief_title: Topical SB-275833 Ointment , 1 % For The Treatment Of Impetigo
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomised , Observer-blind , Multicentre , Non-inferiority , Comparative , Phase III Study Safety Efficacy Topical 1 % SB-275833 Ointment , Applied Twice Daily 5 Days , versus Topical 2 % Sodium Fusidate Ointment Applied Three Times Daily 7 Days Treatment Adult Paediatric Subjects Impetigo .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must primary impetigo total lesion area 100 square centimeter less . Women could bear child must negative urine pregnancy test agree either abstain sexual intercourse use specific effective contraceptive measure . Any sign symptom systemic infection . Any serious underlying disease could imminently life threatening .
